filmography.title: To Have and Have Not
filmography.role_description: A sultry young drifter in Martinique who famously teaches Humphrey Bogart how to whistle in her screen debut.
filmography.plot: During World War II, an American expatriate helps transport a French Resistance leader and his wife to Martinique while romancing a lounge singer.

filmography.title: The Big Sleep
filmography.role_description: The sharp-witted, mysterious elder daughter of a wealthy general who hires private eye Philip Marlowe.
filmography.plot: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a rich family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail, and what might be love.

filmography.title: Dark Passage
filmography.role_description: A sympathetic artist who shelters an escaped convict wrongly accused of murdering his wife.
filmography.plot: A man convicted of murdering his wife escapes from prison and works with a young woman to prove his innocence.

filmography.title: Key Largo
filmography.role_description: A war widow running a hotel in the Florida Keys who is held hostage by a gangster during a hurricane.
filmography.plot: A man visits his war buddy's family hotel and finds a gangster running things. As a hurricane approaches, the two end up confronting each other.

filmography.title: Young Man with a Horn
filmography.role_description: A wealthy, emotionally unstable student who enters a destructive marriage with a jazz trumpeter.
filmography.plot: A young trumpet player rises to fame but struggles with the pressures of his personal life and career.

filmography.title: Bright Leaf
filmography.role_description: A brothel madam who finances and supports a driven tobacco tycoon, despite his love for another woman.
filmography.plot: A man returns to his hometown to seek revenge on the tobacco tycoon who ruined his family, building his own empire in the process.

filmography.title: How to Marry a Millionaire
filmography.role_description: The cynical leader of three models who pool their resources to rent a penthouse in hopes of snagging rich husbands.
filmography.plot: Three women set out to find eligible millionaires to marry, but find true love in the process.

filmography.title: Woman's World
filmography.role_description: The sophisticated, intelligent wife of an executive competing for a top position in an automobile company.
filmography.plot: The owner of a car company invites three regional managers and their wives to New York to decide who will be the new general manager.

filmography.title: The Cobweb
filmography.role_description: A staff member at a psychiatric clinic who becomes involved in the personal and professional conflicts of the institution.
filmography.plot: Staff and patients at a psychiatric clinic clash over drapes for the library, revealing deep personal dysfunctions.

filmography.title: Blood Alley
filmography.role_description: A doctor's daughter who helps an American merchant marine captain smuggle Chinese villagers to Hong Kong.
filmography.plot: A merchant marine captain rescues a village of Chinese peasants from Communist China and transports them to Hong Kong.

filmography.title: Written on the Wind
filmography.role_description: A sensible executive secretary who marries into a wealthy, dysfunctional Texas oil family.
filmography.plot: The alcoholic son of a Texas oil tycoon marries a secretary, but his jealousy and his sister's interference threaten to destroy them.

filmography.title: Designing Woman
filmography.role_description: A sophisticated fashion designer who marries a sportswriter, leading to clashes between their very different social circles.
filmography.plot: A sportswriter and a fashion designer marry after a whirlwind romance, but their different lifestyles and friends cause friction.

filmography.title: The Gift of Love
filmography.role_description: A terminally ill woman who adopts a child to comfort her husband after she is gone.
filmography.plot: A woman with a heart condition adopts a young girl to keep her husband company after her inevitable death.

filmography.title: North West Frontier
filmography.role_description: A resourceful governess who helps a British officer smuggle a young Hindu prince to safety across rebellion-torn India.
filmography.plot: A British Army officer must transport a young prince to safety via an old steam train through rebel-held territory in India.

filmography.title: Sex and the Single Girl
filmography.role_description: A feuding wife involved in a comedic battle of the sexes alongside her husband, played by Henry Fonda.
filmography.plot: A tabloid editor tries to expose the author of a guide for single women, but complications ensue when they meet.

filmography.title: Harper
filmography.role_description: A cynical, wealthy woman who hires private investigator Lew Harper to find her missing husband.
filmography.plot: Private investigator Lew Harper is hired by a wealthy California matron to locate her kidnapped husband.

filmography.title: Murder on the Orient Express
filmography.role_description: A loud, talkative American tourist aboard the famous train who becomes a suspect in a murder investigation.
filmography.plot: In December 1935, when his train is stopped by deep snow, detective Hercule Poirot is called on to solve a murder that occurred in his car the night before.

filmography.title: The Shootist
filmography.role_description: A widowed boarding house owner who befriends a dying gunfighter, John Wayne, in his final days.
filmography.plot: A dying gunfighter spends his last days looking for a way to die with a minimum of pain and a maximum of dignity.

filmography.title: The Fan
filmography.role_description: A famous stage actress who is stalked by a deranged fan, leading to a violent confrontation.
filmography.plot: A deranged fan begins stalking a Broadway actress, and his obsession turns violent when she rejects his advances.

filmography.title: Appointment with Death
filmography.role_description: A domineering, aristocratic Member of Parliament who becomes involved in a murder mystery in the Holy Land.
filmography.plot: Hercule Poirot investigates the murder of a wealthy and tyrannical woman during a tour of the Holy Land.

filmography.title: Misery
filmography.role_description: The literary agent of a famous author who becomes concerned when he goes missing.
filmography.plot: After a famous author is rescued from a car crash by a fan of his novels, he comes to realize that the care she is providing him is only the beginning of a nightmare.

filmography.title: The Mirror Has Two Faces
filmography.role_description: The critical and glamorous mother of a dowdy professor, whose relationship with her daughter is strained by vanity.
filmography.plot: A professor enters a platonic marriage with a colleague, but complications arise when she undergoes a makeover to win his affection.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Supporting Actress; Golden Globe: Win – Best Supporting Actress

filmography.title: My Fellow Americans
filmography.role_description: The former First Lady and wife of a fictional ex-president, bringing wit and dignity to the political comedy.
filmography.plot: Two former U.S. Presidents, hated rivals, join forces to expose the current corrupt President at the risk of their lives.

filmography.title: Dogville
filmography.role_description: A cynical shopkeeper in a small, isolated town who turns against a fugitive seeking refuge.
filmography.plot: A woman on the run from the mob is reluctantly accepted in a small Colorado town, but the price of their protection is high.

filmography.title: Howl's Moving Castle
filmography.role_description: The voice of the vain and powerful witch who curses the protagonist Sophie in the English dub of Miyazaki's masterpiece.
filmography.plot: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

filmography.title: The Walker
filmography.role_description: A Washington D.C. society dame and one of the women escorted by the protagonist, offering sharp wit and gossip.
filmography.plot: An escort who caters to the socialite wives of Washington D.C. men becomes involved in a murder investigation.
